comment: Loved the visuals and the storyline. A must-watch!
Good movie but the pacing was a bit slow in the middle.
An absolute masterpiece! Brilliant acting and direction.
Disappointed with the plot. Expected much more from the trailer.
Great character development but could have been shorter.
The cinematography was breathtaking. Definitely a visual treat!
Decent movie, but lacked depth in some parts.
Loved the performances, especially from the lead actor.
Non-stop action! I was on the edge of my seat the whole time.
Some good moments, but overall a bit underwhelming.
One of the best films of the year. Exceptional in every way.
Really enjoyed it. The soundtrack was amazing!
Solid movie, but it felt a little predictable at times.
Fantastic movie with great special effects and emotional depth.
Not my cup of tea. The story didn't quite capture my attention.
